column1: The Pit Room////We've heard great reviews so we decided to check it out.  It was all that and a bag of chips
column2: and a bag of cookies!! We ordered the 3 meat plate
column6: green beans and potato salad.  Everything was very good.  The outside patio is great
column7: they have big screens for the sports fanatic
column9: the patio is cozy and quiet.  Two thumbs up!!
